lefi.exts.commands.bot module

class Bot(prefix: Union[str, Tuple[str, ...], List[str], Callable], token: str, *args, **kwargs)

Bases: lefi.client.Client

A subclass of [Client](../client.md) that adds Plugins, commands and some more functionality to it.

Attributes:

prefix (str): The prefix to use for commands. commands (Dict[str, Command]): The commands registered. plugins (Dict[str, Plugin]): The plugins registered. checks (List[Callable[…, bool]]): The checks registered. pub_key (Optional[str]): The client’s public key. Used when handling interactions over HTTP. loop (asyncio.AbstractEventLoop): The event loop to use. which is being used. http (lefi.HTTPClient): The [HTTPClient](../http.md) to use for handling requests to the API. ws (lefi.WebSocketClient): The [WebSocketClient](../wsclient.md) which handles the gateway.

add_plugin(plugin: Type[lefi.exts.commands.core.plugin.Plugin]) → None

Add a plugin to the bot.

Parameters:

plugin (Type[Plugin]): The [Plugin](./core/plugin.md) to add.

check(func: Callable[[...], bool]) → Callable[[...], bool]

A method to register a check.

Parameters:

func (Callable[…, bool]): The function to register.

Returns:

The function passed.

command(name: Optional[str] = None, *, cls: Type[lefi.exts.commands.bot.CMD] = <class 'lefi.exts.commands.core.command.Command'>) → Callable[[...], lefi.exts.commands.bot.CMD]

Decorator to register a command.

Parameters:

name (Optional[str]): The name of the command. cls (Optional[Type[CMD]]): The class to use for the command.

Returns:

The decorated function after registering the command.

Example:

```py @bot.command() async def ping(ctx):

await ctx.send(“Pong!”)

```

async execute(ctx: lefi.exts.commands.core.context.Context) → Any

Execute a command.

Parameters:

ctx (Context): The [Context](./core/context.md) of the command.

Returns:

The result of the command.

get_command(name: str) → Optional[lefi.exts.commands.core.command.Command]

Get a command by name.

Parameters:

name (str): The name of the command.

Returns:

The [Command](./core/command.md) if found, otherwise None.

async get_context(message: lefi.objects.message.Message, *, cls: Type[lefi.exts.commands.bot.CTX] = <class 'lefi.exts.commands.core.context.Context'>) → lefi.exts.commands.bot.CTX

Get a context for a message.

Parameters:

message (lefi.Message): The [Message](../message.md) to get the context for. cls (Optional[Type[CTX]]): The class to use for the context.

Returns:

An instance of [Context](./core/context.md).

Get a plugin by name.

Parameters:

name (str): The name of the plugin.

Returns:

The instance of [Plugin](./core/plugin.md) if found, otherwise None.

async get_prefix(message: lefi.objects.message.Message) → Union[str, Tuple[str, ...], List[str]]

Get the prefix for a message.

Parameters:

message (lefi.Message): The [Message](../message.md) from which prefix needs to be extracted.

Returns:

The prefix or a tuple of prefixes.

async handle_command_error(ctx: lefi.exts.commands.core.context.Context, error: Any) → None

Handle a command error.

Parameters:

ctx (Context): The [Context](./core/context.md) of the command. error (Any): The error that occured.

async parse_commands(message: lefi.objects.message.Message) → None

Parse a message for looking up commands.

Parameters:

message (lefi.Message): The [Message](../message.md) to parse.
